<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AisAttributeTableColumnUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>AisAttributeTableColumnUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AisAttributeTableColumnUtil = Class.create();
AisAttributeTableColumnUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	/*
     * Returns an array of table names to show in "table" column
	 * for: ais_datasource_attribute and ais_datasource_field_attribute
     */
	process: function() {
		var tables = [];
		if (current.datasource && current.datasource.source)
			tables = new AisConfigurationUtil().getChildTablesInDatasource(current.datasource, current.datasource.source, current.datasource.type);
		
		return tables;
	},
	
	// filters applies to attribute list when new attributes
    getAttributeFilter: function(table, column, type) {
        var returnFilter = "applies_to=0^ORapplies_to=2";
        var excludeDotWalkAttribute = "^attribute!=dot_walk_fields";
        var excludeUpdatableAttribute = "^attribute!=updatable_field";
        var excludeRootOnlyAttribute = "^root_table_only=false";
        var elementDescriptor = GlideTableDescriptor.get(table).getElementDescriptor(column);
        // only include dot-walk attribute when column is reference
        if (!elementDescriptor.isReference()) {
            returnFilter = returnFilter + excludeDotWalkAttribute;
        }

        // only include updatable_field Property if table is external source schema table
        if (type == 0) {
            returnFilter = returnFilter + excludeUpdatableAttribute;
        }
        // exclude root_only attributes if table is child table
        if (new AisConfigurationUtil().getIndexedSource(table) == null) {
            returnFilter = returnFilter + excludeRootOnlyAttribute;
        }
        return returnFilter + "^EQ";
    },

    type: 'AisAttributeTableColumnUtil'
};]]></script>
